channel.title: Events on Literati IITT
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Literati IITT

item.title: Essay Writing Competition - 400th Prakash Parab Samaroh of Shri Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji
item.description: Summary: On the occasion of the 400th birth anniversary of Shri Guru Tegh Bahadur Ji, the Literary Affairs Council is conducting a week-long essay writing competition, from August 4rd to August 11th.

item.title: Standpoint
item.description: Summary: Standpoint is an annual exposition/public speaking event hosted by Debate and Oratory Club IITT.

item.title: Have We Met Before
